organizations.name: University of Arizona
quotes: The student research team from Prof. Yuzuru Takashima’s lab at the University of Arizona developed a solution to double or triple FOV of AR glasses to 90 degrees with a low cost and low index materials such as plastic and BK7 glasses, published in Optics Express, Jan 2025.

organizations.name: AI & Society
quotes: I'm thrilled to share that my co-authored open-access article with André Sobral, “Artificial Intelligence as Heteromation: The Human Infrastructure Behind the Machine,” has just been published in AI & Society.
